configuration.description.roslyn.workspa: Additional MSBuild properties to pass to the workspace (e.g. Configuration=Debug).
configuration.description.roslyn.skipUnr: Determines if unrecognized projects are skipped when projects are opened.
configuration.description.roslyn.loadMet: Determines if metadata from existing output assemblies is loaded instead of opening referenced projects.
configuration.description.roslyn.showIte: Determines if items from unimported namespaces are shown in completion lists.
configuration.description.roslyn.restore: Determines if projects are restored before they are loaded.
configuration.description.roslyn.compile: Determines if projects are compiled after they are loaded.
configuration.description.roslyn.project: Paths to project files to load.
configuration.description.roslyn.exclude: Glob patterns to exclude from loading (only if project files are not specified).
configuration.description.roslyn.useMult: Determines if projects from all target frameworks are diagnosed.
